name: online translator
description: online translator default for Chinese and English

preferences.name: choose translators you want to use
preferences.description: you can choose from ['google', 'baidu'], use ';' to split like google;baidu;

preferences.name: Google credentials json file path
preferences.description: Google credentials json file path like /home/username/Downloads/translate-XXX.json

preferences.name: a https proxy url like: socks5://127.0.0.1:1080
preferences.description: a https proxy url like: socks5://127.0.0.1:1080
